definitions.title: Hilph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יַחִ֫יטוּ]] Ezr 4:12 (si vera 1. [Nö:GGA. Nö:1884, 1018 Str:§ 13 b]), rare from for [[יְהִיטוּן]] K:§§ 16, 5. 26. 1 M:§ 63 g. Anm., but perh. read this, and regard as

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (orig. meaning dub.; Ar. xa0t.a is sew, = Targum [[חוּט]], Syr. h.ot., cf. BH [[חוּט]] thread; Syr. Pa. Also join together (so here Schulth:ZAW Schulth:xxii (1902). Schulth:162 Anm.), cf. Ar. xay=t. conjunxit trabes (de Goeje:Bibl. Geogr. Arab., Pt. iv (1879), Gloss. 231: cf. Pt. viii (1894), Gloss. P. xx); Frä:ZAW xix (1899), 180 conj. pull down and clear away (for rebuilding), cf. ḫaiṭu D1:WB 274; Jen:KB vi. 344 cp. As. ḫâṭu, observe, learn D1:WB I. [[היט]]), i.e. examine, test; Hpt:Gu. Ezr-Ne 62 conj. √ [[חטט]] excauate, cf. Ar. 0xtt.= secure site by a mark, found a town; str:Gr (1905) 40 [[יְהִיבוּ]] (after Seybold), cf. Ezr 5:16; al. conj. build wall, denom., cf. Ar. h.a0y’it.um wall (√ h.wt. guard, surround)).
